-b|--bounds|: --- JSON object with bounds of a rectangle to show the UI in. Example: '{"bounds":[[955,627],[656,384]]}'
-d|--display|: --- Display number of the screen to show the UI in. Defaults to the main screen.
-s|--size|: --- Size of the window and font to use. Defaults to normal
-t|--delay|: --- How long the key remains on screen in seconds
